class.name: com.krishagni.catissueplus.core.biospecimen.domain.LabSpecimenService
class.sql-query: select ss.identifier as labSvcId, sr.rate as serviceRate from catissue_specimen spmn inner join os_specimen_lab_services ss on ss.specimen_id = spmn.identifier inner join os_lab_services s on s.identifier = ss.service_id inner join os_lab_service_rates sr on sr.service_id = s.identifier inner join os_lab_svcs_rate_list_cps rl_cp on rl_cp.cp_id = spmn.collection_protocol_id and rl_cp.rate_list_id = sr.rate_list_id inner join os_lab_services_rate_lists rl on rl.identifier = rl_cp.rate_list_id where spmn.identifier in (:specimenIds) and ss.service_date >= rl.start_date and (rl.end_date is null or ss.service_date < rl.end_date) and rl.activity_status != 'Disabled' and s.activity_status != 'Disabled'

select s.code, s.description, count(ssr.specimen_id) as specimens, sum(ssr.rate) as total_rate from os_specimen_lab_svc_rates_view ssr inner join catissue_specimen spmn on spmn.identifier = ssr.specimen_id inner join os_lab_services s on s.identifier = ssr.service_id where ssr.service_date >= :startDate and ssr.service_date < :endDate and s.activity_status != 'Disabled' and spmn.collection_protocol_id = :cpId group by s.code, s.description order by s.code
